page.title: 04LEISURE
page.content: There is an active drama club called the Warninglid Players which formed in 1983.This group usually puts on two plays, one around Christmas time.The plays generally last about 2 hours, many of the rehearsals are held in people's houses, most of the costumes are hired & everyone lends a hand to make scenery.A group of Staplefield ladies are involved in quilt making. They make a quilt every year & it is raffled_the proceeds going towards the village. There is a large yearly fair in S'field & also a flower show in which many local residents take part.W'lid fair was on July 6th. Other leisure activities & clubs include a mother & toddler club, a horticultural society, Women's Institute,a young wives' club, coffee morning,church meetings, & a youth club .
